tool_description: Host language-agnostic functions and algorithms via an API.
name: Algorithmia
title: Algorithmia

api_list.name: deleteFile
api_list.description: Delete a file through the Algorithmia Data API

required_parameters.name: connector
required_parameters.description: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: File path (relative to the root of a given data source)

api_list.name: callAlgorithm
api_list.description: You can call each algorithm from the Algorithmia marketplace

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: Input for the algorithm. JSON object

required_parameters.name: owner
required_parameters.description: Algorithm owner

required_parameters.name: algoname
required_parameters.description: Algorithm name

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

api_list.description: Check if directory or file exists without downloading it

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: File or directory

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

required_parameters.name: connector
required_parameters.description: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

api_list.name: deleteDirectory

required_parameters.name: connector
required_parameters.description: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

required_parameters.name: apiKey
required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

optional_parameters.name: force
optional_parameters.description: If true, enables recursive delete of a non-empty directory

api_list.name: getFile

required_parameters.description: File path (relative to the root of a given data source)

required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

required_parameters.name: connector
required_parameters.description: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

api_list.name: listDirectoryContents
api_list.description: List the contents of a directory

required_parameters.description: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

required_parameters.name: path
required_parameters.description: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

required_parameters.name: connector
required_parameters.description: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

optional_parameters.name: acl
optional_parameters.description: Include the directory ACL in the response. (Default = false)

optional_parameters.name: acl
